title:
Title for the tool.
It checks any template, but one at a time. It's typically used to check the use of navboxes (like team squads etc).
Examples of use:
* [//tools.wmflabs.org/templatetransclusioncheck?lang=en&complete=1&name=Template:Real_Madrid_C.F._squad Check of enWP Template:Real Madrid C.F. squad]
* [//tools.wmflabs.org/templatetransclusioncheck/index.php?lang=de&name=Vorlage%3ANavigationsleiste_Olympiasieger_%C3%BCber_100_m_Freistil&complete=1 Check of deWP Vorlage:Navigationsleiste Olympiasieger Ã¼ber 100 m Freistil]
<!-- thanks to 

[[User:Chameleon222|Chameleon222]] ([[User talk:Chameleon222|talk]]) -->
form-label-language:
Form label for an input field requesting a wiki language id.
{{Identical|Language}}
form-label-template:
Form label for an input field for a template name.
{{Identical|Template name}}
form-label-template2: Additional information for the input field for the template name. The template name must include the namespace.
form-label-complete: Label for an checkbox. If checked then a complete/full report will be generated.
feedback-template-missing: A non-existing template name has been entered. $1 is the template name.
feedback-template-noaccess: The script can't access information about the template from the database. $1 is the template name, and $2 is information about the database.
feedback-header-mismatch: Main header for the mismatch section.
feedback-header-no-link: Header for the list of pages that transcludes the template, but which are not linked from the template.
feedback-header-no-transclusion: Header for the list of pages that are linked from the template, but do not transclude it.
feedback-header-redirects: Header for the list of links from the template which are redirects.
feedback-total-count:
Displays the total number of links/transclusions in a list. $1 is the total count.
{{Identical|Total}}
feedback-header-complete: Main header for the complete/full report section.
feedback-header-transclusions: Header for the list of pages that transcludes the template.
feedback-header-links: Header for the list of pages that are linked from the template.
link-edit:
Name for a link for editing a wiki page.
{{Identical|Edit}}
link-create:
Name for a link for creating a wiki page.
{{Identical|Create}}
link-complete: Name for a link to the complete/full report.
footer-stats: A statistics line at the bottom of the report. $1 is a timestamp (the current date/time) and $2 is the number of seconds for the request.
error-language: An error message displayed if the user has entered an unknown/invalid code for the language.
